articles.content: MANILA — About 6 in 10 Filipinos are reluctant to get vaccinated against COVID-19, according to a survey released by Pulse Asia on Friday, as the Philippines continued to battle a surge in coronaviru… [+1978 chars]
articles.description: About 6 in 10 Filipinos are reluctant to get vaccinated against COVID-19, according to a survey released by Pulse Asia on Friday, as the Philippines continued to battle a surge in coronavirus infections.
articles.title: 6 in 10 Filipinos hesitant to get vaccinated vs COVID-19: survey - ABS-CBN News
